abstract: Although venture capital and private equity are often regarded as the same, they have different operational methods, which became apparent in Silver Lake’s sale of Skype to Microsoft.
snippet: Although venture capital and private equity are often regarded as the same, they have different operational methods, which became apparent in Silver Lake’s sale of Skype to Microsoft.
lead_paragraph: Private equity has broken venture capital’s heart, and V.C. is not taking it well.

headline.main: In Silicon Valley, a Culture Clash Sullies a Romance
